name: Gale Burst
desc:
A quick, small blast of wind that knocks back enemies or allies in a straight line.
Deals no damage but cancels burning.

name: Cyclone Shield*
desc:
Creates a defensive barrier of swirling air that provides cover.
Deflects projectiles for 2 rounds.

name: Wind Step
desc:
Uses the wind to increase mobility, allowing for quick repositioning.
Gains +4 SPD, +1MOV to allies within 3 tiles for 3 rounds

name: Tempest Vortex
desc: Summons a powerful, swirling vortex of wind that disorients enemies and cannot be countered.

name: Ember Flick
desc: A short, focused burst of flame aimed at a single target that causes severe burns.

name: Rocket Jump
desc:
Uses a burst of flame to propel the user forward or over obstacles.
Effect: Grants the user a +2 movement boost for 1 turn and allows them to jump over terrain.

name: Flaming Wave
desc: Sends a wave of fire across a straight line, affecting all enemies within range.

name: Inferno Surge
desc: Unleashes a massive blast of fire that targets multiple enemies in the area and inflicts burn.

name: Stone Fist
desc: Creates a solid punch of earth that strikes at the target and leaves them stumbling.

name: Rock Wall
desc:
Raises a solid wall of earth to block the path or create cover.
Effect: Blocks movement for 2 turns in a 1-tile radius, providing +5 defense to those behind it.

name: Seismic Slam
desc:
A massive shockwave that shakes the earth and affects all enemies in the area.
Effect: Deals 20-25 physical damage in a 3-tile radius, stuns all enemies hit for 1 turn.

name: Constrictive Pillars
desc:
Causes the ground to rise up, grabbing an enemy and holding them in place.
Effect: Immobilizes an enemy for 1 turn and deals 15-20 physical damage.

name: Water Whip
desc:
A lash of water that strikes enemies at range.
Restrains enemies for 2 rounds.

name: Ice Shield
desc:
Forms a shield of ice around the user or an ally to absorb damage.
RES+4, greatly empowers healing received, lasts 3 turns.

name: Tidal Pull
desc: Creates a localized water surge that pulls up to 3 enemies toward the user.

name: Flood Surge
desc: Summons a massive wave that overwhelms a large area.

name: Runner's High
desc:
Restores HP equal to user's MAG/2 + MOV. <green>CD:5</>
<pink>Misc:</>Give +2 MOV, Canto+ to ally for 1 turn.

name: Hunting Bow
desc: A small bow with light arrows, it is really easy to use.

name: Heatstone
desc:
+2 MAG
A Fire Nation alchemical item that enhances bending when held.

name: Whetstone
desc:
+2 SKL
Used to sharpen axes for better accuracy.

name: SpiritCHarm
desc:
+2 RES
A protective talisman against spirits and bending.

name: Spirit Water
desc: Flask of purified water imbued with spiritual energy.

name: Smoked Meat
desc: (Restores 5% HP per turn for 3 turns, 1 use) – Simple rations.

name: Gale Piercer
desc: A lightweight recurve bow crafted from Air Nomad wood, reinforced with glider materials. The arrows are shaped to ride air currents, increasing their range.

name: Savitri
desc:
A sacred relic bow. When drawn, the string generates blades of wind that are used to take down benders.
Targets MAG.

name: Terra Cleaver
desc: A massive stone-forged greataxe, its head reinforced with ore that channels Earthbending. When swung, it can crack the ground beneath enemies to slow them.

name: Adamant Breaker
desc:
Description: A legendary axe said to be made from a boulder shaped by the primordial spirits themselves. It grows heavier in Bramar’s hands but moves effortlessly when he swings it. 
Ignores half of enemy DEF.

name: Azure Spike
desc:
A spear engraved with deep-sea minerals, allowing the wielder to channel waterbending through it.
Doubles when initiating combat.

name: Levaiathan's Cry
desc: A weapon crafted from the remnants of a slain sea guardian, infused with spiritual energy. Each strike is like a crashing wave, overwhelming all in its path while revitalizing the user.

name: Sunblade
desc:
A straight blade forged from volcanic metal, designed for both quick stabs and powerful slashes. When swung, it leaves behind a trail of fire.
Causes burning.

name: Pyrefang
desc:
A blade rumored to be kissed by the flames of a Fire Spirit, capable of setting the battlefield ablaze with each slash.
Cleaves.

name: Ash
desc:
A divine blade said to have been wielded by Agni himself, creates dark blue flames that never fade.
Targets worse of DEF or RES. +3 MAG and SPD. Can only be wielded by firebenders.

Legends say Agni himself forged this sword from the heart of a dying star, bestowing it upon a mortal only once in history. The blade’s flames are not mere fire—they are pure destruction, fueled by the wielder’s spirit. When swung, it sunders both body and soul, ensuring that no enemy can withstand its power.

name: WhisperingBeads
desc: A bracelet of carved wooden beads, once used by Air Nomads in meditation. (Increases Evasion and Crit Avoidance.)

name: new_1
desc: A flowing sash that enhances air currents around the wearer. (Increases Movement by 1 and reduces fall damage.)

name: new_2
desc: A small glider-shaped pendant that resonates with wind. (Boosts bow accuracy and reduces enemy ranged damage.)

name: new_3
desc: Weightless footwraps that improve agility. (Increases Speed and grants a chance to dodge attacks.)

name: new_15
desc: Heavy wristbands that help channel earthbending power. (Boosts Strength and allows breaking obstacles faster.)

name: new_14
desc: A talisman made of volcanic rock, rumored to ward off spirits. (Grants resistance to spirit-based attacks and status effects.)

name: new_13
desc: A family crest carved into stone, granting the wearer unshakable resolve. (Increases Defense and prevents Knockback effects.)

name: new_12
desc: Reinforced boots that stabilize footing on unstable ground. (Prevents movement penalties on rough terrain.)

name: new_11
desc: A ring forged from permafrost, radiating a faint chill. (Increases Waterbending power and weakens Fire-based attacks.)

name: new_10
desc: A blue gemstone infused with oceanic energy. (Boosts Healing effects and allows minor HP regeneration each turn.)

name: new_9
desc: Jewelry shaped by the tides, reflecting moonlight. (Increases Speed and reduces the effects of status ailments.)

name: new_8
desc: Ice-crafted armguards that strengthen the body. (Increases Defense and Resistance to magic.)

name: new_7
desc: A gemstone infused with eternal flame, warm to the touch. (Boosts Firebending power and critical hit rate.)

name: new_6
desc: Metal rings worn on the fingers, allowing for swift and precise fire strikes. (Increases Attack Speed and Magic.)

name: new_5
desc: A fireproof garment that flares up when struck. (Reduces damage from Fire-based attacks and retaliates with small flame bursts.)

name: new_4
desc: A bracer that glows with heat, enhancing the wearer’s strikes. (Boosts Strength and gives a chance for attacks to burn enemies.)

name: SpiritLantert
desc: A small, glowing lantern said to keep angry spirits at bay. (Reduces damage from spirit enemies and reveals hidden foes.)

name: new_3
desc: A rare stone said to enhance connection with the Spirit World. (Increases Resistance and improves bending growth rates.)

name: new_2
desc: An ancient relic that enhances battlefield awareness. (Grants a slight boost to all stats and improves vision in fog.)

name: new_1
desc: A broken piece of a spirit beast’s tooth. (Boosts Attack but causes slight HP loss each turn.)

name: Rapier
desc: Eirika Only, effective against horseback and armoured units

name: Runesword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy

name: Wind Sword
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Effective against fliers.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Siegmund
desc: Ephraim only. Strength +5. Effective against monsters.

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: target.wexp['Light'] or target.wexp['Anima'] or target.wexp['Dark'] or target.wexp['Staff']

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Nosferatu
desc: User recovers HP equal to damage dealt.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Fili Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.
